Individual.check_institution()[source]¶

Determines whether or not the Individual comes from MSK or not.

Individual.ext_id = None¶

Indicates the Indiviual external id. This field is validated using the ext_id_validator.

Warning

MRNs are not allowed for HUMANS from MSK. Please use a pseudo MRN or other type of identifier.

Indicates the Indiviual species. See the available choices: SPECIES.

Individual.specimen_set¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.
